com.ephesoft.dcma.imagemagick

Class MultiPageToSinglePageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.imagemagick.MultiPageToSinglePageConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommonConstants, IImageMagickCommonConstants

    public class MultiPageToSinglePageConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICommonConstants, IImageMagickCommonConstants
    Provides functionalities to convert multipage tiff and PDF file into single page tiff files using ImageMagik and GhostScript.
    Version:
    $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on Jun 20, 2013

    • Method Detail

      • convertPdfOrMultiPageTiffToTiff

        public void convertPdfOrMultiPageTiffToTiff(BatchClass batchClass,
                                   java.io.File imageFile,
                                   java.io.File outputFile,
                                   BatchInstanceThread batchInstanceThread,
                                   java.lang.Boolean allowPdfConversion,
                                   boolean deleteImage)
                                     throws DCMAApplicationException
        Converts a given tiff/pdf into tiff. In case of a multi-page pdf/tiff single tiff's for each page will be created.
        Parameters:
        batchClass - BatchClass instance to work upon
        imageFile - File instance to process
        outputFile - Output File instance created as the result of processing
        batchInstanceThread - BatchInstanceThread instance will be used to execute command
        allowPdfConversion - Boolean to determine whether to allow pdf conversion or not
        deleteImage - to determine whether to delete input file after processing or not
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - will be thrown if batchInstanceThread is unable to execute command for conversion

      • convertPdfOrMultiPageTiffToTiff

        public void convertPdfOrMultiPageTiffToTiff(BatchInstance batchInstance,
                                   java.io.File imageFile,
                                   java.io.File outputFile,
                                   BatchInstanceThread batchInstanceThread,
                                   java.lang.Boolean allowPdfConversion,
                                   boolean deleteImage)
                                     throws DCMAApplicationException
        Converts a given tiff/pdf into tiff. In case of a multi-page pdf/tiff single tiff's for each page will be created.
        Parameters:
        batchInstance - BatchClass instance to work upon
        imageFile - File instance to process
        outputFile - Output File instance created as the result of processing
        batchInstanceThread - BatchInstanceThread instance will be used to execute command
        allowPdfConversion - Boolean to determine whether to allow pdf conversion or not
        deleteImage - to determine whether to delete input file after processing or not
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - will be thrown if batchInstanceThread is unable to execute command for conversion

                                   java.io.File imageFile,

      • convertPdfOrMultiPageTiffToTiffUsingIM

        public void convertPdfOrMultiPageTiffToTiffUsingIM(java.lang.String inputParams,
                                          java.io.File imageFile,
                                          java.lang.String outputParams,
                                          java.io.File outputFile,
                                          BatchInstanceThread batchInstanceThread,
                                          int indexOf,
                                          boolean deleteImage)
                                            throws DCMAApplicationException
        Converts a given tiff/pdf into tiff using ImageMagik. In case of a multi-page pdf/tiff single tiff's for each page will be created.
        Parameters:
        inputParams - String input parameters for ImageMagik command
        imageFile - File instance to process
        outputParams - String output parameters for ImageMagik command
        outputFile - Output File instance created as the result of processing
        batchInstanceThread - BatchInstanceThread instance will be used to execute command
        indexOf - index of file extension in imageFile name
        deleteImage - to determine whether to delete input file after processing or not
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - will be thrown if batchInstanceThread is unable to execute command for conversion

      • convertPdfToSinglePageTiffs

        public void convertPdfToSinglePageTiffs(BatchClass batchClass,
                               java.io.File imagePath,
                               java.io.File outputFilePath,
                               BatchInstanceThread thread,
                               boolean isSinglePagePDF)
                                 throws DCMAApplicationException
        This API is used to convert multipage PDF files into TIFF files.
        Parameters:
        batchClass - BatchClass This is the reference of batch class of concerned batch instance.
        imagePath - File This is the path of input file.
        outputFilePath - File This is the path where output files will be created.
        thread - BatchInstanceThread This is reference of thread object where we add formed command.
        isSinglePagePDF - true if the pdf passed contains a single page only
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - If any error occurs while forming command

      • convertPdfToSinglePageTiffs

        public void convertPdfToSinglePageTiffs(BatchInstance batchInstance,
                               java.io.File imagePath,
                               java.io.File outputFilePath,
                               BatchInstanceThread thread,
                               boolean isSinglePagePDF)
                                 throws DCMAApplicationException
        This API is used to convert multipage PDF files into TIFF files.
        Parameters:
        batchInstance - BatchInstance This is the reference of batch class of concerned batch instance.
        imagePath - File This is the path of input file.
        outputFilePath - File This is the path where output files will be created.
        thread - BatchInstanceThread This is reference of thread object where we add formed command.
        isSinglePagePDF - true if the pdf passed contains a single page only
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - If any error occurs while forming command

      • convertPdfToSinglePageTiffsUsingGSAPI

        public void convertPdfToSinglePageTiffsUsingGSAPI(java.lang.String inputParams,
                                         java.io.File imagePath,
                                         java.lang.String outputParams,
                                         java.io.File outputFilePath,
                                         BatchInstanceThread thread,
                                         boolean isSinglePagePdf)
                                           throws DCMAApplicationException
        Converts multipage PDF files into TIFF files using GhostScript.
        Parameters:
        inputParams - This is the command String for ghost script params
        imagePath - This is the reference of input File to be processed
        outputParams - This is the command String for defining properties of output files generated by command
        thread - This is reference of BatchInstanceThread object where we add formed command
        isSinglePagePDF - true if the pdf passed contains a single page only
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - If any error occurs while forming ghostscript command

      • convertInputFileToOutputFileUsingIM

        public void convertInputFileToOutputFileUsingIM(java.lang.String inputParams,
                                       java.lang.String inputImagePath,
                                       java.lang.String outputParams,
                                       java.lang.String outputImagePath,
                                       BatchInstanceThread batchInstanceThread)
                                         throws DCMAApplicationException
        API will convert the input file to output file using image magic on the basis of input params and output params provided.
        Parameters:
        inputParams - String input parameters for ImageMagik command
        inputImagePath - String absolute path of input image.
        outputParams - String output parameters for ImageMagik command
        outputImagePath - String absolute path of output image.
        batchInstanceThread - BatchInstanceThread instance will be used to execute command
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - if any error occurs while executing imageMagik command or batchInstanceThread is not proper
